entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
